contents.title: How do I change my account details?
contents.content: To change your account details, go to settings, select 'Update Personal Details'.

contents.title: How do I upgrade my account?
contents.content: Go to Settings/Account/Upgrade Account/Select ACT Premium.

contents.title: What share can I trade on ACT platforms?
contents.content: Up to 10 technology shares can be selected and you can find all the options under Asset Management/Shares.

contents.title: What Cryptocurrencies can I trade on ACT platforms?
contents.content: 3 crypto assets can be selected and you can find the options under Asset Management/Cryptocurrencies.

contents.title: What is ACT?
contents.content: ACT: Agentic Corporate Trader is an online trading platform that allows users to invest in technology shares and cryptocurrencies.

contents.title: Who is ACT Web for?
contents.content: ACT Web is developed for Fund Maganers.

contents.title: Who is ACT Mobile for?
contents.content: ATC Mobile is for Fund Managers and Fund Administrators.
